name: Swamp Swamp Swamp
description:
In Swamp Swamp Swamp Claire has been captured by aliens and is trying to escape before they kill her. She is running through a swamp land and a candy forest trying to get back to outer space to finally return home. She will try to get to the other side of the universe by overcoming obstacles, jumping over platforms, escaping the enemy chasing her, and finding all of the keys to get through each door. In Level 1, Claire will have to endure the treacherous obstacles of the swamp, including swimming through the swampy waters to retrieve keys,  and jump through giant flames. Once she accesses the next level, she can move on to Level 2. In Level 2 Claire hits the psychedelic swamp. She must navigate in a bright foggy world, attempting to retrieve more keys. Finally, the grand level arrived and Claire must find the rest of the keys to open the last door, to end the game in Level 3. In Level 3, Claire must find her way around moving platforms, difficult enemies, and mid air obstacles. Once she completes her goal and has retrieved enough keys to open the door, she has won the game!

Directions:

Mouse: Allows player to turn

Game Controller: Use X to jump, left up button is swim up and left down button is swim down

Keyboard: Use AWD or Arrow keys to navigate. M  for Menu. Z to swim up and X to swim down
